eligibility: Charge a minimum spend of S$4,000 to the approved DBS Vantage Card within the first 30 days from the card approval date
Payment of Annual Fee S$599.50 (inclusive of GST) is required

fees.annual_fee_waiver: While the Annual Fee is strictly non-waivable for the first year, you will enjoy a waiver in the subsequent years if a minimum of S$60,000 worth of retail spend is made in the preceding Card Year
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: 3.25%, on top of the prevailing foreign exchange rate determined by Visa
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the amount withdrawn per transaction or S$15 (whichever is greater)
